name: Technical Tasks
description: A taxonomy of high-level technical AI / Machine learning tasks a system may perform during its operation

children.name: Processing
children.description: Computation that does not involve the usage of AI and ML.

children.name: Source Localization
children.description: The task of determining the source location of an input signal and/or collections of multiple input signals.

children.name: Object Detection
children.description: The task of location objects of interest via visual perception.

children.name: Machine Translation
children.description: Automatic translation of text from a source to a target language.

children.name: Retrieval
children.description: The task of selecting relevant instances from an available pool of candidates.

children.name: Recommendation
children.description: Automatic retrieval and serving of data to a user based on their profile, activity and/or history.

children.name: Search
children.description: Automatic retrieval and serving of data to a user based on an explicitly supplied query.

children.name: Sequential Analysis
children.description: The task of producing predictions based on a history of multiple data points

children.name: Supervised Learning
children.description: Learning methods facilitating training with ground truth.

children.name: Regression
children.description: The task of annotating data with real-valued predictions.

children.name: Classification
children.description: The task of annotating data to one or more semantic labels from a given labelset.

children.name: Unsupervised Learning
children.description: The approach of modeling data patterns and structure without usage of ground truth.

children.name: Clustering
children.description: The unsupervised task of grouping data instances into groups with high internal similarity and low similarity across different groups.

children.name: Generation
children.description: The task of generating from existing background knowledge, context and/or prompts.
